  • Method Details

    • addReview

      public static void addReview(models.Review reviewObj) throws Exception
      Method to add review to the current reviews of the movieReview#writeReview(User). Check if there is any movie available to add review. If movie exists, check if there are any reviews from the user. if the user has reviewed and rated the movie, add it into the current list of reviews and ratings for the movie.
      Parameters:
      reviewObj - Review from the user
      Throws:
      Exception

    • updateReviews

      public static void updateReviews(String oldReview, int oldRating, models.Review reviewToBeChanged) throws Exception
      Method to update the review of the movie after user has overwritten their review Review#writeReview(User). Find the movie that user has changed their review and update accordingly by removing old reviews and add new reviews.
      Parameters:
      oldReview - Old review that user wants to overwrite
      oldRating - Old rating given by the user
      reviewToBeChanged - New review and rating by the user
      Throws:
      Exception

    • createMovie

      public static void createMovie() throws Exception
      Method for staff to create a movie. Includes an interface to ask staff for inputs. Create a movie based on staff inputs.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • updateMovie

      public static void updateMovie() throws Exception
      Method for the staff to update the status of the movie. Check for available movies, if there is a matching movie, change the corresponding movie status. Update the list of movies and available screenings.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • removeMovie

      public static void removeMovie(String movieName) throws Exception
      Method to remove a movie by changing the status of the movie to End of Showing. Update the corresponding movie screening by removing it.
      Parameters:
      movieName - Title of movie to be deleted
      Throws:
      Exception

    • showMovieList

      public static ArrayList<models.Movie> showMovieList() throws Exception
      Method to display all available movie and its corresponding status and rating
      Returns:
      ArrayList List of Movies with its coresponding title, status and rating.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getAvailableMovieList

      public static ArrayList<models.Movie> getAvailableMovieList(ArrayList<models.Movie> arrListToBeLooped) throws Exception
      Helper function to retrieve all the available movies.
      Parameters:
      arrListToBeLooped - The list of all movies to be passed in.
      Returns:
      ArrayList List of available movies that status are not End of Showing.
      Throws:
      Exception

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • searchMovieList

      public static ArrayList<models.Movie> searchMovieList(String movieTitle) throws Exception
      Method to search for the movie by the user. Allows user to search for available movies without typing out the entire movie title due to substring matching.
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - Title of the movie user wants to search
      Returns:
      ArrayList the list of available movies that the user may want to search.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • sortMovie

      public static void sortMovie() throws Exception
      Method to sort the ArrayList of movies based on user input and print the top 5 available movies based on (1) by rating, (2) sales
      Throws:
      Exception
